title: Fostering Global Citizenship Through Experiential Philanthropy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of charitable activity concepts and general awareness of nonprofit organizational roles
context.additional_context: Language arts-integrated program implementing experiential learning through actual donation decision-making

learning_goals: Learners can comparatively evaluate three or more non-profit organizations using an analysis framework (business impact, financial transparency, target group characteristics)
Learners can write evidence-based donation proposals (within 100 characters) and participate in peer reviews to finalize recommendations

Learners can explain changes in charitable judgment processes through reflective journals before/after experiential activities, using three or more specific criteria (e.g., community impact vs. global scalability)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
